# About `.vscode`

## Overview

| Name & Type | Location | Purpose |
| :---        | :---     | :---    |
| <img src="URI" alt="Directory" width="auto" height="14px"/> `.vscode` | `/.vscode` | Contains 'Workspace-Specific' Config `*.json` Files for [Visual Studio Code](url) |
